comments:
I20060210-1640

1. I just started I20060210-1640 on my development workspace
2. I selected a project
3. I attempted to replace with another version
4. I got a dialog saying: "The user operation is waiting for background work to complete"
5. The top active job was "Updating CVS Workspace"
6. I cancelled it
This had no effect

Created an attachment (id=34534)
Dialog after cancelling CVS Workspace update

Created an attachment (id=34535)
Thread dump after cancelling the CVS Workspace update

Increase severity as even after closing the dialog, the job never got cancelled. This job even prevented to shut down Eclipse (I got another "The user operation is waiting for background work to complete" dialog that could not be closed)

From the stack trace it appears that there are two locks that cannot be obtained: the workspace lock and the CVS lock. However, no threads are holding these locks so it is unclear why the waiting threads are blocked. Are there any exceptions in the log?

These are the only entries in the .log around the time I reported the bug.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.core 4 0 2006-02-11 09:15:45.419

!STACK 1
